channel.title: Comments on: Jamie asks, “How can I avoid malicious software and dangerous websites?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Sandra asks, "Is my computer infected?" - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Sandra asks, "Is my computer infected?" - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] Another good way to protect yourself is to stay off of sketchy websites. If you are using the Google Chrome browser, it will alert you with a red warning screen if you click on a website that is known to host infections. You can check out some of our other tips for avoiding malicious websites in this article. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Another good way to protect yourself is to stay off of sketchy websites. If you are using the Google Chrome browser, it will alert you with a red warning screen if you click on a website that is known to host infections. You can check out some of our other tips for avoiding malicious websites in this article. […]
